fees.description: $63.69 (inc. GST) Special Meter Read fee. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$142.59 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is disconnected including when you move out. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$142.59 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is reconnected. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$2.75 (inc. GST) (inc. GST) Direct Credit or Debit dishonour payment fee

electricityContract.terms: See our full terms and conditions to www.covau.com.au for details.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary the charges of this plan (including their amount, nature and structure) at any time by giving you a notice at least 5 business days prior to the effective date of variation.All prices listed are inclusive of GST except where indicated.

demandCharges.description: Demand Charge  All kW (c/kW Monthly). Uses the maximum kW consumption from the meter readings within the period Apr - Oct, Mon - Fri, 16:00 - 20:00.
Demand Charge  All kW (c/kW Monthly). Uses the maximum kW consumption from the meter readings within the period Nov - Mar, Mon - Fri, 16:00 - 20:00.

solarFeedInTariff.displayName: Feed In Tariff: Single Rate Feed In Tariff

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: This agreement continues until you or we end it.
